```{r}
  # baseDir <- "G:\Team Drives\WSO USA - Projects\000 - Project"
} else {
  stop("Please define your directory for Mac, then delete this line.")
  # baseDir <- "/Volumes/GoogleDrive/Team Drives/WSO USA - Projects/000 - Project"
}
```
